How It Works (Competitor-Matched)

Ghost Tags (Daily Rotation)

  • ‚Ä¢ Each model tags each other model once/day
  • ‚Ä¢ tags per model per day (~ apart)
  • ‚Ä¢ Weighted toward peak hours: 1 AM, 4 AM, 10 AM AST
  • ‚Ä¢ Dead zones: 6-8 PM AST (minimal activity)
  • ‚Ä¢ Post auto-deletes after 5 minutes
  • ‚Ä¢ Result: matches competitor's proven pattern

Pinned 24hr Posts (Daily)

  • ‚Ä¢ Posted at 6am daily
  • ‚Ä¢ Pinned to top of profile
  • ‚Ä¢ Uses expireDays: 1 for auto-removal
  • ‚Ä¢ Rotates targets so everyone gets promoted
  • ‚Ä¢ Result: profile visitors see promos
